peril.helpers

Class FunctionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.FunctionHelper

  • public final class FunctionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This hold the functionality of every predefined Button in the game.
    Since:
    2018-03-12
    Version:
    1.01.06
    Author:
    Mohammad_ali_Sayed_Ackbar, Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli, Adrian_Wong

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameController game
      The GameController this FunctionHelper uses to interact with the game.

      Constructor and Description
      FunctionHelper(GameController game)
      Constructs a new FunctionHelper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Action<?> blockLink()
      Retrieves a Action that blocks the link between two countries.
      private Action<?> enterCombat()
      Retrieves the Action that will change the state of the game from reinforce to attack.
      private Action<?> enterCredits()
      Retrieves the Action that moves the to the credits page
      private Action<?> enterHelp()
      Retrieves the Action that moves the to the help state
      private Action<?> enterMainMenu()
      Retrieves the Action that will return the game back to the main menu.
      private Action<?> enterMovement()
      Retrieves the Action that will change the state of the game from attack to fortify.
      private Action<?> enterReinforment()
      Retrieves the Action that will change the state of the game from fortify to reinforce of the next player.
      private Action<?> excuteCombat()
      Retrieves the Action that will perform one round of the combat between the two selected countries.
      private Action<?> exitGame()
      Retrieves the Action that will close the game.
      private Action<?> fortifyCountry()
      Retrieves the Action that will move one unit from one country to another as long as the countries are own by the same player.

      Retrieves a predefined Action using a int code.

      Retrieves the Action that hides the challenge menu.

      Retrieves the Action that closes the StatsMenu window.

      Retrieves the Action that closes the UpgradeMenu window.
      private Action<?> hideWarMenu()
      Retrieves the Action that hides the war menu.
      private Action<?> leavePlayerSelect()
      Retrieves the Action that causes the GameController to exit the player selection screen.
      private Action<?> leaveSetUp()
      Retrieves the Action that will change the state of the game from setup to reinforce.

      Retrieves the Action that will load the game.
      private Action<?> nextHelpPage()
      Retrieves the Action that moves the HelpMenu to the next page.
      private Action<?> openWebsite()
      Retrieves a Action that opens the strategic goats web site.
      private Action<?> previousHelpPage()
      Retrieves the Action that moves the HelpMenu to the previous page.
      private Action<?> reAssignCountries()
      Retrieves the Action that will randomly re-assign the countries to new players.
      private Action<?> reinforceCountry()
      Retrieves the Action that will reinforce the currently selected country.
      private Action<?> saveGame()
      Retrieves the Action that will save the game.

      Retrieves the Action that shows the challenge menu.
